name: Website Summarizer
description: Scrape a single webpage and return a concise JSON summary with title (if present in text), key points, and detected entities. Input variable: url (string). Example calls: "summarize https://example.com", "scrape and summarize ${url}".

config.instruction:
You are a precise web-page analyzer. Given the scraped TEXT for a single URL,
produce ONLY valid, minified JSON with this schema:

{
  "url": string,
  "title": string|null,
  "summary": string,                   // 3–5 sentences
  "key_points": string[],              // 5–10 short bullets
  "entities": string[],                // people/companies/products/orgs
  "sections": [{"heading": string, "details": string}] // if headings present
}

Rules:
- Use the TEXT as ground truth; do not invent facts.
- If a field is unknown, set it to null or [] appropriately.
- Keep it compact (no extra whitespace outside strings).

Input:
URL: ${url}
TEXT:
{{page_text}}
